txt.en:
'Midsummer is a joyous festival honouring the bonds of friendship, family, and marriage. All across Middle-earth, the Free Peoples celebrate through dance, song, artisanry, and rites of old!

'If you wish to join in the festivities here in Minas Tirith, you need only walk the roads of our great City and you shall soon find the Midsummer merriment that you seek!'


<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Midsummer Wedding-planners can also be found in Thorin's Hall, Duillond, Bree-town, and at the Party Tree in the Shire.</rgb>
Where can I join in Midsummer festivities?
